p: Toothache can be a problem anytime, especially when soldiers are on the move and have no access to modern medical care in the remote jungles, desert or mountainous regions. The nearest dental clinic may be several kilometres away. An anti-toothache formulation has been developed incorporating the ingredients of locally available Himalayan medicinal plants, which can come in handy during operations to alleviate toothache in emergencies (Fig. 15). The formulation contains ethanol isolates of five plants and essential oil of two plants.
